Title: Lébélik

----

Year: 2014

----

Client: Lébélik

----

Projecttype1: Branding

----

Projecttype2: 

----

Text: Global visual redesign of the brand Lébélik : logotype, stationery, packagings, website and web campaign developed by Keeward. The art direction borrows occasionally to eastern graphical codes with a sober and contemporary approach.
